property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have "blocker". Then you may draw a card. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Crimson" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, this turn, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your creatures in your graveyard. ■ While this creature has 6000 power or more, it gets "double breaker". ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may say "Another Cup!". If you do, put this creature on the top of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. {DORON GO} Kung Fu:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Kung Fu" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Kung Fu" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, this turn, your opponent's other creatures can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {CENTER GOD LINK} (As you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has "Right God Link" and/or "Left God Link".)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature is linked with a God, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. (Dragonoids don't count.) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)
